titles.title: Audit the IRS Act
Audit the IRS Act
To provide that persons having seriously delinquent tax debts shall be ineligible for employment by the Internal Revenue Service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Audit the IRS Act
This bill prohibits an individual who has a seriously delinquent tax debt from being appointed, or continue serving, as an officer or employee of the Internal Revenue Service.
